sentences.en: ‘I will not!’ Bert yelled and stamped his foot (= because he was angry ) .
sentences.cn: “我才不呢！”伯特跺着脚叫喊道。

sentences.en: a 29-cent stamp
sentences.cn: 一枚 29 美分的邮票

sentences.en: a date stamp
sentences.cn: 日期戳

sentences.en: a second-class stamp
sentences.cn: 一张二类邮件的邮票

sentences.en: Are you surprised to see Einstein on a Chinese stamp?
sentences.cn: 看到中国邮票上的爱因斯坦你感到惊奇 吗 ?

sentences.en: Car manufacturers stamp a vehicle identification number at several places on new cars to help track down stolen vehicles.
sentences.cn: 汽车生产商们在新车车身的几个地方打上车辆识别码以帮助追查被盗车辆。

sentences.en: I stuck the stamp on and ran to the postbox.
sentences.cn: 我贴上邮票,然后向邮箱跑去.

sentences.en: I want one more stamp to complete my set.
sentences.cn: 我再有一枚邮票就凑成一套了.

sentences.en: It's FREEPOST, so there's no need for a stamp.
sentences.cn: 这是免费邮寄，不用贴邮票。

sentences.en: Last November the commission gave its stamp of approval to the deal.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，委员会核准了这宗交易。

sentences.en: Make sure the stamp is properly glued to the envelope.
sentences.cn: 务必把邮票在信封上贴好.

sentences.en: Parliament is seen as a rubber stamp for decisions made elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 议会被看作橡皮图章，只会批准他人的决定。

sentences.en: Parliament's job is to rubber-stamp his decisions.
sentences.cn: 国会的工作就是例行公事式地批准他作出的决定。

sentences.en: Please don't stick the stamp on; I like to collect them.
sentences.cn: 请不要帖上这些邮票, 我要集邮的.

sentences.en: Richard collects stamps.
sentences.cn: 理查德集邮。

sentences.en: She stood at the bus stop stamping her feet (= because she was cold ) .
sentences.cn: 她站在公共汽车站头，不停地跺着脚。

sentences.en: Such generous actions stamp him as a man of honour.
sentences.cn: 如此慷慨的举动说明他是一位君子.

sentences.en: The audience stamped and shouted.
sentences.cn: 观众又是跺脚又是高声叫喊。

sentences.en: The doctors are trying to stamp out the disease.
sentences.cn: 医生正在尽力消灭这种疾病.

sentences.en: The flaw in this stamp makes it less valuable.
sentences.cn: 这张邮票因为有点缺陷,不那么值钱.

sentences.en: The machine can stamp out hundreds of components in an hour.
sentences.cn: 这台机器每小时可冲压数百件机件.

sentences.en: The Sanitary Board tries to stamp out the epidemic.
sentences.cn: 卫生局试图消灭这种流行病.

sentences.en: The stamp was a dull blue colour.
sentences.cn: 邮票是晦暗的深蓝色。

words.tran_cn: 铭刻的；盖上邮戳的；顿足的
打印器；盖印人；[机] 压模；印章
贴上邮票（stamp的过去式）；顿足

phrases.tran_cn: 发给失业者或贫民的粮票
橡皮图章；无主见的人；未经审查即批准
时间标识；印时戳，记时打印机

trans.tran_en: a small piece of paper that you buy and stick onto an envelope or package before posting it

trans.tran_cn: 贴邮票于…，标记，用脚踩踏，捣碎
trans.tran_en: to put your foot down onto the ground loudly and with a lot of force
